plot: A distinguished English gentleman has a secret life--he is the notorious jewel thief the press has dubbed &"The Amateur Cracksman&". When he meets a woman and falls in love he decides to &"retire&" from that life, but an old friend comes to him with a predicament that entails him committing one last job.   Written by  frankfob2@yahoo.com
title: Raffles
